directions: Mix all ingredients except beans in large bowl. Stir in beans. Pour into 2-quart baking dish or casserole.
Bake 50-60 minutes or until hot and bubbly.
ingredients: 1/4 teaspoon cayenne pepper, or more to taste
1 (15.5 ounce) can great Northern beans, drained
1 (15.5 ounce) can black beans, drained, rinsed
1 (15 ounce) can red or pinto beans, drained
title: Apple Butter Baked Beans
